messages.message: Ran into the same issue! Fixed by changing  `443:dev:443`  to `80:dev:80`  and access localhost thru http://localhost instead of https://localhost

*Summary of the issue & resolution:*

The nginx port changed from 443 with SSL to 80 without SSL. 

To fix things, rebuild your sandbox with the “refresh base image” option on, then change your port forwarding to use 80:dev:80. Connect using http://localhost (http://localhost) in your browser.
